description: The API checks whether an FBS shop is blocked due to invoice-related issues. When blocked, the shop cannot create new inbound requests, and its warehouse inventory is restricted from being sold.

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to use API. Valid for multiple use in 4 hours

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopper's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for shop API

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated by partner_id, api_path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened

response_fields.name: shop_id
response_fields.description: Shopper's unique identifier for a shop

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

error_codes.description: System error, please try again later
The information you queried is not found

notes: The API appears to be part of a console/announcement section and includes multiple URL variations for different regions (including Chinese Mainland). The documentation provides comprehensive error handling information and API permissions section is visible but details are not shown in the image.
